Some predictions for next chapters:
Sister finds out about co-worker, gets mad, leaves for Tokyo with stepbro. She either stays with stepbro or meets someone in Tokyo.
If the author wants to drag it out, then ch. 4 will be MC juggling co-worker and sister, and Tokyo trip will be ch. 5. 
Then ch. 6 will be dads funeral, where MC and sister see each other for the first time since  the break up and still "have feelings for each other". He gets her pregnant, but doesn't know about it.
Ch. 7/epilogue will be MC finding out he's the dad, asking her to stay and deciding not to sell the house. 
It's that or MC is in full despair after she leaves for Tokyo, stepbro is the father and MC is selling the house cuz why would he need a house when he's solo.

If theyre gonna go all out degenerate, idc what they do I'm all for it, with that said, I don't want that megane with him, and I'm glad that his sister left the house with no explanation implying there will be a part 4
